p: (E)-2-((3,7-dimethylocta-2,6-dien-1-yl)oxy)-1-isopropyl-4-methylbenzene ( 14): colourless oil, 82% yield. 1H-NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3): δ 1.33 (d, J = 6.3 Hz, 6H, 2 × CH 3), 1.74 (s, 3H, CH 3), 1.81 (s, 3H, CH 3), 1.85 (s, 3H, CH 3), 2.19–2.27 (m, 4H, 2 × CH 2), 2.44 (s, 3H, ArCH 3), 3.42–3.44 (m, 1H, CH), 4.65 (d, J = 7.5 Hz, 2H, OCH 2), 5.20–5.23 (m, 1H, =CH), 5.61–5.64 (m, 1H, =CH), 6.8 (s, 1H, Ar), 6.85 (d, J = 7.5 Hz, 1H, Ar), 7.21 (d, J = 7.8 Hz, 1H, Ar). 13C-NMR (75 MHz, CDCl 3): δ 16.7 (CH 3), 17.8 (CH 3), 21.5 (ArCH 3), 22.9 (2 × CH 3), 25.8 (CH 3), 26.5 (CH 2), 26.6 (CH), 39.6 (CH 2), 65.1 (OCH 2), 112.8 (Ar), 120.5 (=CH), 121.1 (Ar), 124.0 (=CH), 125.9 (Ar), 131.7 (=C), 134.4 (Ar), 136.2 (Ar), 140.1 (=C), 156.1 (Ar). Mixture of E/ Z isomers with ratio of 9.3/1. For sake of clarity, we have reported only the signals related to the major isomer. Calcd for C 20H 30O: C, 83.86; H, 10.56. Found: C, 83.80; H, 10.51.
